metadata.dataset_name: WEEKLY AVERAGE PRICES OF CTC LEAF AND ALL DUST SOLD AT INDIAN AUCTION
metadata.source_name: Ministry of Commerce & Industry, Government of India
metadata.about: The "Weekly Average Prices of CTC Leaf and All Dust Sold at Indian Auction During" table is a dataset that records the average prices of CTC (Crush, Tear, Curl) leaf tea and all dust tea sold at various auction centers in different cities across India on a weekly basis.
metadata.data_insights: This data can be beneficial for tea producers, buyers, traders, and analysts to understand market trends, make informed decisions, and assess the economic conditions of the tea industry in India. Regularly updating this table helps to monitor changes in tea prices over time and track seasonal variations or any other market influences.
